name: BLOODSPORT
description:
B L O O D S P O R T
You are lost in the woods with a compass.
Keep your eyes on the thing that hunts you.
Survive until the sun comes up.Mouse - Look, Blink Space - Skip instructions

a prequel minigame for BADBLOOD

B O U N T Y : First THREE TWO ONE person to send a screenshot of the SUN to w.jy.song@gmail.com or @songfeuds will get a free code for BADBLOOD and a physical copy of BADLANDS PERIODICAL.

BOUNTY TAKEN by @hwong246, @Togg_, @swampfriend. Thanks for playing!!

by Winnie Song

special thanks to @bfod
